name: Tarim
description:
Somewhere, in some town that may be unknown to all; there was Tarim, a sad but strong hermitthat without knowing it or be waiting for it would be forced by itself to enter on a great adventure to save to the town of his childhood, a town without stains and that never had known the fear.
Tarim is a adventure of action and rol with a campaign about a hero, Tarim and the story about how he saved his people and the sacrifices he had to make it. Also with a randomly generated mode that take advantage of all the combat all the interesting features of combat and RPG functions that Tarim has.

Key features:
  • Levels set and carefully developed to achieve a desired gaming experience.
  • Fight with unique bosses.
  • Lots of enemies all of them with different features.
  • 3 Big chapters available to play.
  • A randomly generated mode that take advantage of all the combat all the interesting features of combat and RPG functions that Tarim has.
  • Tons of unlockable items and swords.
